data.description:
Welcome to Stack the Blocks!, the ultimate block stacking game that combines strategy, creativity, and physics-based fun in immersive Mixed Reality.

Featuring:


- Dozens of Levels: Progress through increasingly challenging timed levels. To win, carefully build a well-balanced structure to reach the top before time runs out! Each stage introduces new types of blocks and puzzles to solve. Reach new heights and unlock more levels as you advance.

- Limitless Sandbox Mode: Free from the constraints of levels, the sandbox mode allows you to spawn an unlimited variety of blocks and experiment without the fear of time expiring. Construct elaborate towers, whimsical structures, or experimental designsâ€”the sky's the limit!

- Vibrant Graphics and Intuitive Controls: Designed for VR, Stack the Blocks! features bright, eye-catching colors and easy-to-use controls that make stacking both simple and satisfying.

- Look forward to new blocks, themes, and challenges in future updates.


Stack the Blocks! offers endless opportunities to build, create, and enjoy.

changelog.change_log: Complete physics overhaul! Interactions with blocks are now much more lifelike, and the blocks each have their own weight.
Complete physics overhaul! Your hands now interact with the world in a much more lifelike way, and blocks each have their own weight.
